servicesPage.heroDescription: Professional wood restoration using our proven 3-step process.
servicesPage.processDescription: Every project follows our tried-and-true restoration method for consistent, beautiful results.

washing.title: Pressure Washing
washing.description: We start with a thorough deep clean using professional-grade pressure washing equipment. This removes years of dirt, grime, mold, mildew, and old finishes, revealing the natural wood underneath.

sanding.title: Sanding
sanding.description: Once dry, we carefully sand the entire surface to create the perfect canvas for staining. Sanding smooths rough spots, opens the wood grain, and ensures optimal stain absorption.
details: Opens wood pores for better absorption

staining.title: Staining
staining.description: The final step is applying premium-quality stain that penetrates deep into the wood. Our stains protect against UV damage, moisture, and wear while bringing out the natural beauty of your wood.

servicesPage.surfacesDescription: We restore all types of outdoor wood surfaces.
